title: | M O V E I N S P E C I A L | 1 MONTH FREE ON ALL UNITS
posting_body: ['1 MONTH FREE on 12 Month Lease!', 'Welcome to STUDIO ARNAZ!', 'Welcome to your new home at Studio Arnaz Apartments!', 'ONE MONTH FREE MOVE-IN SPECIAL', 'Studio Arnaz Apartments is steps away from Cedars Sinai Hospital and is just minutes from Rodeo Drive and UCLA.', 'Grab a bite to eat at countless high-end restaurants and find limitless shopping at The Beverly Center, Beverly Connection, and The Beverly Grove.', 'It’s a great choice to live for those who love to indulge in the finer things that Beverly Hills has to offer.', 'Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.', 'Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.', 'Affordable rents starting at $2250, For a household of 1, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $99,330.', 'For a household of 2, Gross Annual Income Must be LESS than $108,100.', 'Please contact us for more information.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 43', 'OR Text', '43', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'See our property details here:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 550 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Elegant New Flooring', '- Dishwasher', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Cable Ready', '- Elevator', '- Stove/Oven', '- Gas Range', '- Walk', 'In Closet', '- Private Balcony', '- Air Conditioning/Heating', '- Window Coverings', '- Disposal', '- Relaxing Gas Fireplace', '- Microwave', '- Refrigerator', 'Community Amenities', '- Flexible Lease Terms Available', '- Gated Access', '- Controlled Access Entry Building', '- Close to Upscale Shopping Centers', '- Professional Management', '- Onsite and On Call Maintenance', '- Assigned Parking - Carport/Garage/Open Space', '- Laundry Facility in Building', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Recycling', '- Walking Distance to Fine Dining', '- Elevator', 'Pet Policy', 'We love pets!', 'Certain dog breed restrictions may apply.', '25 lb Weight Limit.', 'Income Requirements:', 'Studio Arnaz is an affordable community that has income and rent restrictions.', 'Income restrictions are dependent upon the household size.', 'Affordable rents start at $2250.', 'Gross Annual Income for a household of 1 is $99,330.', 'Gross Annual Income for a household of 2 is $108,100.', 'Driving Directions', 'Cross-Streets: Robertson Blvd and 3rd St', 'In between 3rd St and Burton Way on Arnaz Dr.', 'Office Hours', 'Tuesday-Saturday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Studio Arnaz', '320 Arnaz Drive, Los Angeles, CA, 90048', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'zdM3vQeD']
